name: DinoRun Fan Game
description:
The beta version of DinoRun is the next step in the evolution of this exciting blockchain game created by Heritage. 

In this version, players will encounter a new character named Sculpty from the LilWhiteCamera universe as shown in the first Devlog for the game.

But that's not all - the beta version of DinoRun also features other power-ups and upgrades, These enhancements offer players a chance to enhance their skills and increase their chances of getting the top score on the leaderboard.

And speaking of the leaderboard, players now have a chance to win a free NFT if they can claim the coveted top spot. The game will utilize smart contract technology to ensure a transparent and fair leaderboard, making it impossible to manipulate or cheat.

Thanks to blockchain technology, DinoRun offers a truly decentralized and secure gaming experience. Each player's progress is recorded on the blockchain.

join the discord server of Secret Money society to participate. 

https://discord.gg/ASeX3D3zyw

And follow us on twitter:
